name: Ring the Bell at Bosingak
description:
Controls / 사용법:

Space: Use hammer  / 스페이스바 : 나무기둥 당기기

Esc: Reset / 새로고침

Description:

A little project by Team Leeboro. Ring a traditional Korean bell at Bosingak in Seoul.

Bosingak was medieval Seoul's central bell tower. Rung daily to mark the start and end of the city's curfew, when the gates would close for the night, as well as during times of emergency. Today, it sits silent for most of the year, its massive bell brought to life only to mark special occasions.

Sounds are from Zapsplat.com.
